summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 含有定義常用值和參考資料型別 (Data Type)、事件和事件處理常式、介面、屬性 (Attribute) 和處理例外狀況的主要類別和基底類別。

span.span: The namespace contains fundamental classes and base classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attributes, and processing exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其他類別提供支援資料類型轉換、 方法參數操作、 數學、 遠端和本機程式引動過程，應用程式環境管理和監督的 managed 和 unmanaged 應用程式的服務。Other classes provide services supporting data type conversion, method parameter manipulation, mathematics, remote and local program invocation, application environment management, and supervision of managed and unmanaged applications. 中的存取類型從 C# 程式碼而不需要提供完整的類型名稱的命名空間包含`using System;`的原始程式碼檔案開頭的陳述式。To access types in the namespace from C# code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 中的存取類型命名空間從 C + + /cli CLI 程式碼，而不需要提供完整的型別名稱，包含`using namespace System;`的原始程式碼檔案開頭的陳述式。To access types in the namespace from C++/CLI code without having to provide fully qualified type names, include the `using namespace System;` statement at the beginning of your source code file. 此外，您必須以編譯[/clr](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fec5a8c0-40ec-484c-a213-8dec918c1d6c)切換。In addition, you must compile with the [/clr](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fec5a8c0-40ec-484c-a213-8dec918c1d6c) switch.
